items.title: Spotting Winners: Yum China (NYSE:YUMC) And Traditional Fast Food Stocks In Q4
items.description: The end of the earnings season is always a good time to take a step back and see who shined (and who not so much). Let’s take a look at how traditional fast food stocks fared in Q4, starting with Yum China (NYSE:YUMC).
